name: Transporter Truck Simulator
detailed_description:
Drive the world's most famous trucks through challenging roads that will test all your driving skills.

Transporter Truck Simulator gives you a very realistic truck driving experience! Deliver heavy oil tanks and other cargos loaded in your oil truck. Operate big trucks to deliver oil tanks and complete different missions on TIME!
Driving a big truck in the exciting Transporter Truck Simulator game may not be easy as it looks! You must be an EXPERT to park trucks to deliver oil tanks to the right locations.

Play the CAREER MODE of this oil truck simulator, make money and purchase new trucks and upgrades. Explore the trucking world and become the king of the road!

Game Features:
— A lot of missions
— Time limit
— Different trucks
— Great soundtrack
— Many grand oil trucks to drive

short_description: Transporter Truck Simulator gives you a very realistic truck driving experience! Deliver heavy oil tanks and other cargos loaded in your oil truck. Operate big trucks to deliver oil tanks and complete different missions on TIME!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP x64
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 730
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
